member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.AssemblyType
member.summary: Assembly type represents aggregation of asset types

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.AssemblyType.AggregationOfAssetTypes
member.summary: List of Asset types which are agregated in this assembly. This set should always contain at least one asset type.

member.name: M:Xbim.DPoW.AssemblyType.GetAggregationOfAssetTypes(Xbim.DPoW.ProjectStage)
member.summary: Gets real asset types which should live in the same project stage as this assembly
member.param: Project stage where this assembly lives alongside with asset types it aggregates.

member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.AssetType
member.summary: This class represents asset types in DPoW

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.AssetType.Variant
member.summary: Variant of this asset type. This is typicaly something like 'A', 'B', 'C' or some other distinquisher between different types of the same type

member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.Attribute
member.summary: Arbitrary attributes which can be assigned to any object implementing abstract class DPoWAttributableObject

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.Attribute.Value
member.summary: Value of attribute. This is always string for the sake of simplicity

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.Attribute.ValueType
member.summary: Enumeration of basic value types. This is a hint for eventual conversion of string value to other types

member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.Classification
member.summary: Classification system like Uniclass2, NRM, Omniclass or any other. It contains classification references which represent single classification nodes

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.Classification.ClassificationReferences
member.summary: List of classification references. These references are referenced in DPoW by their IDs

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.Classification.Id
member.summary: Id of this classification. This value is initialized to new unique ID in constructor.

member.name: M:Xbim.DPoW.ClassificationReference.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor initializes ID to new unique value.

member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.Contact
member.summary: Contact represents person in DPoW. E-mail is essential field to fill in to keep COBie happy.

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.Contact.Email
member.summary: E-mail is essential field to fill in. It is used as a reference value in COBie

member.name: M:Xbim.DPoW.Contact.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor initializes ID to new unique value

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.Documentation.ClassificationReferenceIds
member.summary: Classification references assigned to this documentation. It is possible to assign multiple classification references from multiple classification systems if necessary. Use 'GetClassificationReferences' method to get real objects instead of their IDs.

member.name: M:Xbim.DPoW.Documentation.GetClassificationReferences(Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork)
member.summary: Gets all classification references based on IDs
member.param: Plan of work in which this object and classification references live

member.name: M:Xbim.DPoW.Documentation.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor of documentation object. It sets Id to new GUID.

member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.DPoWAttributableObject
member.summary: Abstract class containing set of attributes. All descendants of this class can have an arbitrary list of attributes

member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.DPoWObject
member.summary: Abstract class for space types, asset types and assembly types

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.DPoWObject.ClassificationReferenceIds
member.summary: Classification reference IDs. These hold IDs of classification references from diferent classification systems

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.DPoWObject.RequiredLOD
member.summary: Required LOD of this object representing detail of geometry as a code

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.DPoWObject.RequiredLOI
member.summary: Required LOI of this object representing required attributes as an ammount of information for specific level

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.DPoWObject.Jobs
member.summary: Jobs related to this object. This is used to assign responsibility to people and/or roles for specific actions.

member.name: M:Xbim.DPoW.DPoWObject.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor initializes ID to new unique value

member.name: M:Xbim.DPoW.Facility.GetCategory(Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork)
member.summary: Gets category from actual plan of work by it's ID

member.name: M:Xbim.DPoW.Facility.GetClassificationAndReference(Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork)
member.summary: Gets category from actual plan of work by it's ID

member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.Job
member.summary: Job is used to represent required action with responsibility and other related information.

member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork
member.summary: Root object of this data schema

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork.ClassificationSystems
member.summary: Classification systems defined in this plan of work

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork.Project
member.summary: Project information invariant between project stages

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork.Facility
member.summary: Facility information invariant between project stages

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork.ProjectStages
member.summary: Project stages representing time based development of requirements

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork.Client
member.summary: Client of this plan of work. Use 'ClientContactId' to set client.

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork.Contacts
member.summary: List of contacts for this plan of work. Contacts are referenced by their IDs on other places in the schema.

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork.Roles
member.summary: Roles on this plan of work. Roles are used for example to assign responsibility when there is no specific person defined at particular point in time

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork.CreatedOn
member.summary: The date when this plan of work fas created

member.name: M:Xbim.DPoW.PlanOfWork.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes ID to new unique value

member.summary: Creates Plan of work from serialized XML stream

member.summary: Creates Plan of work from serialized XML file

member.summary: Saves Plan of work to stream as JSON string

member.summary: This class represents required attribute from Digital Plan of Work

member.name: P:Xbim.DPoW.RequiredAttribute.PropertySetName
member.summary: Variant set name. This helps to convert data between DPoW, IFC and COBie

member.summary: ID of the role which is assigned to be responsible

member.summary: Gets responsible role from plan of work

member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.Role
member.summary: Role represents abstract role in the project and plan of work. It can be assigned to a job in it's responsibility field.

member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.VolumeUnits
member.summary: Volume units for DPoW. This is a subset of COBie units

member.name: T:Xbim.DPoW.SpaceType
member.summary: Represents spatial structure unit in plan of work. It can be used to define required attributes. It is attributable object so it can contain arbitrary descriptive data about itself.
